summary.para: Contains statistical information from the NTFS file system.
summary.div: Tip Applications targeting Windows 10 can access additional statistics through .

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.LogFileFullExceptions
member.summary: The number of exceptions generated due to the log file being full.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.OtherExceptions
member.summary: The number of other exceptions generated.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftReads
member.summary: The number of read operations on the master file table (MFT).

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the MFT.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations on the MFT.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the MFT.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftWritesUserLevel.Write
member.summary: The number of MFT writes due to a write operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftWritesUserLevel.Create
member.summary: The number of MFT writes due to a create operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftWritesUserLevel.SetInfo
member.summary: The number of MFT writes due to setting file information.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftWritesUserLevel.Flush
member.summary: The number of MFT writes due to a flush operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftWritesFlushForLogFileFull
member.summary: The number of flushes of the MFT performed because the log file was full.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftWritesLazyWriter
member.summary: The number of MFT write operations performed by the lazy writer thread.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftWritesUserRequest
member.summary: Reserved.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Mft2Writes
member.summary: The number of write operations on the MFT mirror.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Mft2WriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the MFT mirror.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Mft2WritesUserLevel.Write
member.summary: The number of MFT mirror writes due to a write operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Mft2WritesUserLevel.Create
member.summary: The number of MFT mirror writes due to a create operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Mft2WritesUserLevel.SetInfo
member.summary: The number of MFT mirror writes due to setting file information.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Mft2WritesUserLevel.Flush
member.summary: The number of MFT mirror writes due to a flush operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Mft2WritesFlushForLogFileFull
member.summary: The number of flushes of the MFT mirror performed because the log file was full.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Mft2WritesLazyWriter
member.summary: The number of MFT mirror write operations performed by the lazy writer thread.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Mft2WritesUserRequest
member.summary: Reserved.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.RootIndexReads
member.summary: The number of read operations on the root index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.RootIndexReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the root index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.RootIndexWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations on the root index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.RootIndexWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the root index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.BitmapReads
member.summary: The number of read operations on the cluster allocation bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.BitmapReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the cluster allocation bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.BitmapWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations on the cluster allocation bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.BitmapWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the cluster allocation bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.BitmapWritesFlushForLogFileFull
member.summary: The number of flushes of the bitmap performed because the log file was full.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.BitmapWritesLazyWriter
member.summary: The number of bitmap write operations performed by the lazy writer thread.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.BitmapWritesUserRequest
member.summary: Reserved.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.BitmapWritesUserLevel.Write
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to a write operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.BitmapWritesUserLevel.Create
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to a create operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.BitmapWritesUserLevel.SetInfo
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to setting file information.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftBitmapReads
member.summary: The number of read operations on the MFT bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftBitmapReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the MFT bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftBitmapWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations on the MFT bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftBitmapWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the MFT bitmap.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftBitmapWritesFlushForLogFileFull
member.summary: The number of flushes of the MFT bitmap performed because the log file was full.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftBitmapWritesLazyWriter
member.summary: The number of MFT bitmap write operations performed by the lazy writer thread.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftBitmapWritesUserRequest
member.summary: Reserved.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftBitmapWritesUserLevel.Write
member.summary: The number of MFT bitmap writes due to a write operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftBitmapWritesUserLevel.Create
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to a create operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftBitmapWritesUserLevel.SetInfo
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to setting file information.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.MftBitmapWritesUserLevel.Flush
member.summary: The number of bitmap writes due to a flush operation.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.UserIndexReads
member.summary: The number of read operations on the user index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.UserIndexReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the user index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.UserIndexWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations on the user index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.UserIndexWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the user index.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.LogFileReads
member.summary: The number of read operations on the log file.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.LogFileReadBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes read from the log file.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.LogFileWrites
member.summary: The number of write operations on the log file.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.LogFileWriteBytes
member.summary: The number of bytes written to the log file.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Allocate.Calls
member.summary: The number of individual calls to allocate clusters.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Allocate.Clusters
member.summary: The number of clusters allocated.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Allocate.Hints
member.summary: The number of times a hint was specified.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Allocate.RunsReturned
member.summary: The number of runs used to satisfy all the requests.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Allocate.HintsHonored
member.summary: The number of times the hint was useful.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Allocate.HintsClusters
member.summary: The number of clusters allocated through the hint.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Allocate.Cache
member.summary: The number of times the cache was useful other than the hint.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Allocate.CacheClusters
member.summary: The number of clusters allocated through the cache other than the hint.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Allocate.CacheMiss
member.summary: The number of times the cache was not useful.

member.name: NTFS_STATISTICS.Allocate.CacheMissClusters
member.summary: The number of clusters allocated without the cache.

summary.para: The number of failed attempts made to acquire a slab of storage for use on the current thinly provisioned volume.
Support for this member started with Windows 8.1.
